message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for your business.  Given its potential, I'm offering it to you for $2,200,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a great product, but I'm on a tight budget and need to be mindful of our company's expenses.

I appreciate your interest, Bob, and understand you're working within a budget. However, $1,200,000 significantly undervalues the product's potential impact on your business. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget with the new offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,500,000. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to be able to justify the cost to my team and stakeholders.
